entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:39 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
